languages.text: {n}Сверкая отполированной челюстью, Люссарий протягивает к птице руку, тоже сделанную из сверкающего металла.{/n} "Ее имя — Аквила. Увидев ее однажды, я понял, что существу такой стати просто необходим подобающий уход. Теперь Аквила — неотъемлемая часть моей жизни. А я ее... "

{n}His polished jaw shining, Lussarius extends his hand toward the bird, a hand likewise made of shiny metal.{/n} "Her name is Aquila. As soon as I saw her, I knew a creature of such proud grace simply must be properly taken care of. Now Aquila is an integral part of my life. As I am of hers... "
languages.original_text: {n}Сверкая отполированной челюстью, Люссарий протягивает к птице руку, тоже сделанную из сверкающего металла.{/n} "Ее имя — Аквила. Увидев ее однажды, я понял, что существу такой стати просто необходим подобающий уход. Теперь Аквила — неотъемлемая часть моей жизни. А я ее... "

{n}His polished jaw shining, Lussarius extends his hand toward the bird, a hand likewise made of shiny metal.{/n} "Her name is Aquila. As soon as I saw her, I knew a creature of such proud grace simply must be properly taken care of. Now Aquila is an integral part of my life. As I am of hers... "

languages.text: {n}Mit strahlendem polierten Kiefer streckt Lussarius die ebenfalls aus strahlendem Metall gefertigte Hand nach dem Vogel aus.{/n} "Sie heißt Aquila. Sobald ich sie sah, wusste ich, dass derart stolze Eleganz einfach ordentlicher Fürsorge bedurfte. Nun ist Aquila ein fester Bestandteil meines Lebens. Genau wie ich des ihren ..."
languages.original_text: {n}His polished jaw shining, Lussarius extends his hand toward the bird, a hand likewise made of shiny metal.{/n} "Her name is Aquila. As soon as I saw her, I knew a creature of such proud grace simply must be properly taken care of. Now Aquila is an integral part of my life. As I am of hers... "

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit strahlendem polierten Kiefer streckt Lussarius die ebenfalls aus strahlendem Metall gefertigte Hand nach dem Vogel aus.{/n} "Sie heißt Aquila. Sobald ich sie sah, wusste ich, dass derart stolze Eleganz einfach ordentlicher Fürsorge bedurfte. Nun ist Aquila ein fester Bestandteil meines Lebens. Genau wie ich des ihren ..."

languages.text: {n}Lussarius tend une main tout aussi métallique et reluisante que sa mâchoire vers un oiseau.{/n} « Elle s'appelle Aquila. Dès que je l'ai vue, j'ai su qu'une créature aussi gracieuse méritait d'être choyée. À présent, Aquila fait partie intégrante de ma vie. Et moi, de la sienne... »
languages.original_text: {n}His polished jaw shining, Lussarius extends his hand toward the bird, a hand likewise made of shiny metal.{/n} "Her name is Aquila. As soon as I saw her, I knew a creature of such proud grace simply must be properly taken care of. Now Aquila is an integral part of my life. As I am of hers... "

traits.locale_text: {n}Lussarius tend une main tout aussi métallique et reluisante que sa mâchoire vers un oiseau.{/n} « Elle s'appelle Aquila. Dès que je l'ai vue, j'ai su qu'une créature aussi gracieuse méritait d'être choyée. À présent, Aquila fait partie intégrante de ma vie. Et moi, de la sienne... »

languages.text: {n}卢萨利乌斯抛光的下巴闪闪发光，向那只鹰伸出了一只手，那只手也同样由闪闪发光的金属制成。{/n}“它的名字叫阿奎拉，也就是‘双头鹰’的意思。当我第一次见到它，我就意识到，像它这么高贵、优雅的宠物必须精心照料。如今，阿奎拉成了我生命中不可或缺的伴侣，在它眼中，我也同样如此重要……”
languages.original_text: {n}His polished jaw shining, Lussarius extends his hand toward the bird, a hand likewise made of shiny metal.{/n} "Her name is Aquila. As soon as I saw her, I knew a creature of such proud grace simply must be properly taken care of. Now Aquila is an integral part of my life. As I am of hers... "

traits.locale_text: {n}卢萨利乌斯抛光的下巴闪闪发光，向那只鹰伸出了一只手，那只手也同样由闪闪发光的金属制成。{/n}“它的名字叫阿奎拉，也就是‘双头鹰’的意思。当我第一次见到它，我就意识到，像它这么高贵、优雅的宠物必须精心照料。如今，阿奎拉成了我生命中不可或缺的伴侣，在它眼中，我也同样如此重要……”

languages.text: {n}Lussarius extiende una mano de metal brillante hacia el ave, arrancando un destello a su barbilla resplandeciente.{/n} «Se llama Aquila. En cuanto la vi, supe que una orgullosa criatura de tan suma elegancia debe cuidarse como es debido. Ahora Aquila es una parte integral de mi vida, y yo de la suya...».
languages.original_text: {n}His polished jaw shining, Lussarius extends his hand toward the bird, a hand likewise made of shiny metal.{/n} "Her name is Aquila. As soon as I saw her, I knew a creature of such proud grace simply must be properly taken care of. Now Aquila is an integral part of my life. As I am of hers... "

En cuanto la vi, supe que una orgullosa criatura de tan suma elegancia debe cuidarse como es debido. Ahora Aquila es una parte integral de mi vida, y yo de la suya...».

languages.text: {n}磨き上げられた顎を輝かせながら、ルッサリウスは光沢のある金属でできた手を鳥に差し伸べた。{/n}「彼女の名はアクィラ。初めて見たとき、その誇り高い優雅さを持つ生き物は正しく世話されるべきだと直感しました。今やアクィラは私の生活に欠かせない存在です。そして私も、彼女にとって…」
languages.original_text: {n}His polished jaw shining, Lussarius extends his hand toward the bird, a hand likewise made of shiny metal.{/n} "Her name is Aquila. As soon as I saw her, I knew a creature of such proud grace simply must be properly taken care of. Now Aquila is an integral part of my life. As I am of hers... "

traits.locale_text: {n}磨き上げられた顎を輝かせながら、ルッサリウスは光沢のある金属でできた手を鳥に差し伸べた。{/n}「彼女の名はアクィラ。初めて見たとき、その誇り高い優雅さを持つ生き物は正しく世話されるべきだと直感しました。今やアクィラは私の生活に欠かせない存在です。そして私も、彼女にとって…」

languages.text: {n}Lussarius, ışıl ışıl çenesini parlatırken metalden eliyle kuşa uzanıyor.{/n} "Adı Çiftbaş. Onu görür görmez böylesine asil bir varlığın ancak özenle yaşatılması gerektiğini anladım. Artık Çiftbaş, hayatımın ayrılmaz bir parçası. Ben de onun…"
languages.original_text: {n}His polished jaw shining, Lussarius extends his hand toward the bird, a hand likewise made of shiny metal.{/n} "Her name is Aquila. As soon as I saw her, I knew a creature of such proud grace simply must be properly taken care of. Now Aquila is an integral part of my life. As I am of hers... "
